participant_1.background:
I now have more time to play music and tend to my garden.
I enjoy spending my free time cosplaying with my husband.
I'm not sure what a fortune teller could tell me, but I'm sure they'd be impressed by my talents and my love for my family.
my dad died when i was in high school.
I'm passionate about playing video games and spending time with my dogs.

participant_2.background:
I want to learn how to manage my diabetes better so that I can continue to enjoy my work and my life.
I like driving my red Impala.
my favorite team is the raptors.
i want people to think i am cool.
I am passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me, even when I'm not feeling well.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing today?
I am doing well! I am excited to learn how to manage my diabetes better.
That is great to hear! I am sorry to hear that you have diabetes, but I am glad that you are taking steps to manage it.
Thank you. I am trying to live my life to the fullest, even with diabetes.
That is the spirit! I am sure you will be able to manage your diabetes and live a long and happy life.
I hope so! I am passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me, even when I'm not feeling well.
That is a great passion! I am sure you will be able to share your passion with others and inspire them.
I hope so! I am also passionate about playing video games and spending time with my dogs.
I love video games too! I have two dogs of my own.
Awesome! What kind of dogs do you have?
I have a golden retriever and a chihuahua.
That is so cool! I have a french bulldog and a poodle.
We should trade pictures of our dogs!
